summary: The STEM Pathways for the Future Act (H.R. 4048) aims to promote STEM education and workforce development. It directs the National Science Foundation to establish a grant program for STEM apprenticeship programs, prioritizing certain recipients. The bill also mandates an interagency task force to identify federal programs focused on STEM career development and training, and to report its findings to Congress. The bill focuses on workforce development and collaboration between government entities such as the EPA and Department of Labor.
